entry.title: Prayer Power: Interceding for Others | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Prayer Power: Interceding for Others | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 4 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 4 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book was written by Pastor Mark Finley. The topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled “Prayer Power: Interceding for Others”. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
(July 18–July, 24 2020)
Reading: Rev. 12:7–9, Eph. 6:12, Heb. 7:25, Eph. 1:15–21, Dan. 10:10–14, 1 John 5:14–16
Memory Text: “Confess your trespasses to one another, and pray for one another, that you may be healed. The effective, fervent prayer of a righteous man avails much” (James 5:16, NKJV).
Sunday (Kenny Shelton) “A Cosmic Struggle” Monday (Jill Morikone) “Jesus: The Mighty Intercessor” Tuesday (John Lomacang) “Paul’s Intercessory Prayers” Wednesday (Greg Morkikone) “Unseen Powers at Work” Thursday (Ryan Day) “Prayer Focus”

entry.title: “Witnessing for Jesus: Miracles and Missions“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200028)

media:group.media:title: “Witnessing for Jesus: Miracles and Missions“ - 3ABN Today (TDY200028)
media:group.media:description:
Today Greg and Jill Morikone will be interviewing Pastor, writer, teacher, musician Bradley Booth. He will be sharing his testimony. His Mission work around the world has inspired him to write books about mission adventures. You don't want to miss how writing these stories have become his mission in life and a tool to help others spread the gospel.

media:group.media:title: “Hellfire - Extinguishing the Myths “ - 3ABN Today (TDY200027)
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever wondered why a loving God would want to condemn most of the planet to a fiery hell? What is the purpose of hell? How long will the people burn in the lake of fire. Join Ryan Day and his guests; Pr. John Lomacang and Kenny Shelton as they destroy the myths around this hot topic.

entry.title: 7 Keys to Godly Relationships (Sermon) | Jill Morikone

media:group.media:title: 7 Keys to Godly Relationships (Sermon) | Jill Morikone
media:group.media:description:
Sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. Are you struggling to have healthy relationships? Perhaps you have not spoken with a loved one or a friend in years? Let learn how the Bible can help you heal and grow your relationships. Join us for this episode of Worship Hour as we study the Word of God and find answers to important questions with Jill Morikone.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
